did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Minutes, catalogues, records, proceedings, constitution, bylaws, a directory, a census book, a "death book," and periodicals.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Minutes of the Newfield School Board, District 5, 8 and 18; Newfield Public Library minute book and catalogues, and Newfield Town Library Association, program; records and proceedings of the Town of Cayuta, Tioga County, New York; constitution, bylaws, and minutes of the Newfield Literary Society and Debating Club; constitution, by laws, minutes, and list of ex-presidents of the Newfield Ladies Monday Club; directory of the Newfield and Trumbull's Corners Methodist Episcopal Church and Sunday School; undertaker's census book and "Death Book" (annual list of people buried); Grant's Petersburg Progress (Virginia), Vol. l, No. 4, April 10, 1965; and issues of the Newfield Tribune and the Newfield Home News.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Minutes of the Newfield School Board, District 5, 8 and 18; Newfield Public Library minute book and catalogues, and Newfield Town Library Association, program; records and proceedings of the Town of Cayuta, Tioga County, New York; constitution, bylaws, and minutes of the Newfield Literary Society and Debating Club; constitution, by laws, minutes, and list of ex-presidents of the Newfield Ladies Monday Club; directory of the Newfield and Trumbull's Corners Methodist Episcopal Church and Sunday School; undertaker's census book and "Death Book" (annual list of people buried); Grant's Petersburg Progress (Virginia), Vol. l, No. 4, April 10, 1965; and issues of the Newfield Tribune and the Newfield Home News.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Newfield and Trumbull's Corners Methodist Episcopal Church Sunday School.
Newfield Literary Society and Debating Club (N.Y.)

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Newfield Public Library manuscript collection, #3046. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: School District #8. October 4, 1831-October 13, 1868 (1855 not in order)
The Records and Proceedings of the Town of Cayuta, Tioga County, New York 1811-1862 . (Dates and type of entries not in consecutive order)
Newfield Literary Society and Debating Club, Constitution and By-Laws, Minutes, October 17, 1896-April 23, 1897
Newfield Ladies Monday Club, Constitution and By-Laws, Minutes, October 11, 1948-March 15, 1965 ; list of Ex-Presidents, 1893-1947 .
Newfield and Trumbull's Corners Methodist Episcopal Church and Sunday School Directory, July 1, 1880
"Death Book," A.R. Allen (Undertaker), 1903-1920 (Annual list of people buried)
Grant's Petersburg Progress (Virginia) Vol. 1, No. 4, April 10, 1865
Newfield Home News. June 7, 1941 (Sourvenir Edition) (with Vols. II and III)
